data.text:
It was a day when Maruzensky wanted to work on her dancing 
and had allowed me to observe—
One, two… finish♪
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
Maruzensky danced perfectly to the 
song she had only just learned.

Whooo… That felt good! Getting into the 
rhythm comes easy with that zippy beat♪
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: That was fun to watch, too.
It was fun to watch, too.

data.text:
Gosh, trainer, I can see your eyes twinkling… Just like when we 
first met. Hmhm, you're kind of making me blush.
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
Gosh, trainer, I can see your eyes twinkling… Just like when we 
first met. Hmhm, you're making me blush a little.
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
But, I'm glad you enjoyed it! That's what 
we're about, right? Enjoying things♪
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text: Dancing or racing, you better have a blast while you're at it!
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text: (School bell rings…)

… My, is it that late already? Let's leave the dancing here. I 
gotta skitty before I miss it.
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
Aah, you wanna know～? Haha, it's not 
like I'm not going on a date!
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
No, actually, a car manufacturer is having 
an exhibition… and guess what!
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
I heard you can get a miniature version of my lovely Tacchan! It 
sounds so cute! I want it so much!
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
They're handing them out from 7:00 p.m. and there's a limited 
number, so I need to go get in line early!
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text: Yep. Sorry for the rush. I'll see you tomorrow, trainer—
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text: Yeah. I'm sorry for the rush. See you tomorrow, trainer—
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text: Ah, Marzen! I'm so glad to see you～!
data.name: Junior Horsegirl A

data.text: Oh my, girls! What's going on?
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
You were just practicing your dancing, right?! 
We really wanted to watch…!
data.name: Junior Horsegirl B

data.text:
We heard from our teacher that your dancing's stupid good and we 
could learn a lot from it… so please!
data.name: Junior Horsegirl A

data.text: Oh dearie… Hehe, I can't say no to a request like that, can I?♪
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
It's fine. There's no substitute for the smiles on those cute 
little faces. Come then, watch me carefully!
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
It seems Maruzensky has decided to continue with the 
dance lesson for the younger students.

Remembering the excited look on Maruzensky's face 
earlier… I decided to search up the exhibition 
hall and go get one myself.
—And the next day.

Alright, another lively day of training 
awaits♪ I'm raring to go! What do I—
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: Before we start, here's something for you.
choices.processed: <size=39>Before we start, here's something for you.</size>

choices.text: Before we go, I got you something.

data.text: Eh… that's…!?
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
I placed the miniature car on the palm of 
my hand and showed it to Maruzensky.

Whaaaa!? Trainer… did you go all the 
way to the venue to get me one?!
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
Whaaaa!? Trainer… did you go all the 
way to the venue to get me one?!
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text: Wasn't it pretty far? And the line must have been long?
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
You went through all this trouble because 
of what I said yesterday…
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: I just wanted you to be happy.

data.text:
You went through all this trouble because 
of what I said yesterday…
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: I just wanted you to be happy.

data.text: Trainer…
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text: Trainer…
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text: … Yeah, totally! This makes me so, sooo happy! Thank you!
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text:
I know! Do you have time after training? 
I want to thank you for the minicar.
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text: Ehehe… Let's enjoy some adult time together♪
data.name: Maruzensky

data.text: —After training, we went for a drive in Maruzensky's beloved car.

With the cool night wind blowing, I spent 
some fearfu — err, adult times…

title: I Want to See Her Smile
